product_description: With precision cutting edges for soft and hard wire as well as piano wire. Cuts bolts, nails, rivets, etc. Up to ø 5, 2 mm. Cutting edges additionally induction hardened, cutting edge hardness approx. 64 HRC.

name: Bates- Bolt Cutter, 8.5", Dark Blue, Small Screw Cutter Tool, Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter, Mini Bolt Cutters, Small Bolt Cutters, Heavy Duty Wire Cutters, Bolt Cutters 8 Inch, Compact Bolt Cutter
short_description: Bates bolt cutter, measuring 8.5 inches, is designed for efficient cutting with a maximum cutting capacity of 0.12 inches (3mm).
Constructed with durable steel jaws, this bolt cutter offers precision cutting for materials like wires, bolts, and chains.
The ergonomic, non-slip handles provide comfort and stability, allowing for easy handling and reduced hand fatigue during use.
Its compact size makes it ideal for small tasks around the home, workshop, or on the go, while still delivering strong cutting performance.
The adjustable bolt mechanism ensures optimal jaw alignment and long-lasting cutting power for consistent results.

name: Crescent H.K. Porter Compact Bolt Cutter with Flush Cut Blades and Plastic Dipped Handles - 0890MA
short_description: Ideal for fencing work, exposed fasteners, or where near flush cut is required
Induction hardened cutting edges for ultimate durability
Recessed notch blade design holds cutting material close for extreme cutting power
Easy-to-clean industrial plastic dipped handle grips
Cuts mild steel (80,000 PSI) to 1/4", 6mm diameter
Ideal for fencing work, exposed fasteners, or where near flush cut is required
Angle cutter head and clipper cut blades create a near flush cut
NEVER use any H.K. Porter cutters on energized circuits, wire, or cable!
product_description: Since 1880, H.K. Porter has been the leading brand in cutting tools with a worldwide reputation for quality, strength and durability. The extensive line of products includes manual cutters, ratcheting cutters and specialty tools designed to handle everything from light wires and brushes to heavy steel rods and bars. Superior strength cutting heads and blades provide more efficient cutting. Precision cutting edges are accurately beveled for specific types of cuts. Alloy tool steel cutting jaws are drop forged for maximum wear resistance and longer cutting life.

name: TOOLEAGUE 3Pcs Bolt Cutter Pliers Set,14" Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter,10" Wire Cable Cutter,8" Mini Bolt Cutter with Storage Bag,CR-V Blade, Easily Cut Locks, Barbed Wire, Thick Wire,Bolts, Rods, Chain
short_description: 【Bolt Cutter Pliers Set】The package includes:1x14" heavy duty bolt cutter,1x10" high leverage cable cutter, 1x8" mini bolt cutter,and a storage bag,which is convenient for better storage and carrying.
【Blades Material】:The blades of the three pliers are all made of high quality high carbon steel, which is high hardness, not easy to break, to ensure efficient cutting, long service life.

【Comfortable Handles】:The ergonomic PP+TPR handles of 14" and 8" bolt cutters provide extra comfort while cutting and offer better grip for easier control of cutting.The flexible and non-slip PVC material of 10" high leverage wire cable cutter increases friction and provides a more comfortable grip.

【Cutting Capacity】:The 14" bolt cutter with cutting capacity of HRC≤48: 3/16inch, HRC≤19: 5/16inch, the 8" bolt cutter's max cutting capacity is HRC≤15: 1/8" (3.5mm Maximum), HRC≤30: 1/13" (2mm Maximum),the 10" cable cutter is capable ofeasily shearing soft 4/0 aluminum, 2/0 soft copper, 7/8 inch coaxial cable and 100-pair 24 AWG communications cable.
【Wide Applications】:The bolt cutter pliers set is widely used for cutting cables, steel wires, barbed wire, rivets, chains, etc.An necessary tool for you.
